candidates.title: Update const-decoder requirement from 0.1.0 to 0.2.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: rust
labels.description: Pull requests that update Rust code

candidates.body:
Updates the requirements on [const-decoder](https://github.com/slowli/const-decoder) to permit the latest version.
Changelog

Sourced from const-decoder's changelog.

0.2.0 - 2021-10-10

Added

  • Support URL-safe variant of base64 encoding.
  • Support base-(2,4,8,16,32,64) encodings with custom alphabets.
  • Add nightly feature (requires a nightly Rust toolchain) for improved panic messages.

Changed

  • Rename SkipWhitespace::parse() and Pem::parse() methods to decode() for uniformity with Decoder::decode.
  • Mark Decoder enum as non-exhaustive.

Fixed

  • Check final decoder state, preventing error such as an odd number of hex digits or invalid terminal base64 char.

0.1.0 - 2021-04-16

The initial release of const-decoder.

Commits
  • 22be02b Merge pull request #4 from slowli/prepare-release
  • 8b45aff Bump crate version to 0.2.0
  • 09a73a2 Mark Decoder enum as non-exhaustive
  • 4d643fa Include Bech32 example into readme
  • 9f10fca Remove scheduled CI builds
  • 974d47d Mention nightly feature in changelog
  • 6363fd4 Update pem requirement from 0.8.3 to 1.0.0
  • 3704954 Merge pull request #2 from slowli/nightly-feature
  • 176affd Check nightly crate feature in CI
  • 57559c1 Add nightly crate feature
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view
